questions.quote: I'm sorry, I'm sorry, it just seems that Robert isn't as concealed in the shorts area, as ah, one may have hoped.
Ohh, here you are. I was looking for you before. Joshua's gone so you and Emily are free to go.
Hey, y'know what, maybe we should get going. I mean what time did Chloe say we should be there?
Okay, I'm in my sweat pants. Bring on the food! What's the matter?
Listen, I ah, went to that restaurant that you were talking about last week...
Uh, I don't know. Why don't you put it right here next to my water?
Oh hey uh, be careful with that 3-D last supper, Judas is a little loose.
of course she has. if she'd never had a serious relationship I'd go round broadcasting it like some unstoppable moron.
Look, if Phoebe wants to marry David, she should, I'm not gonna stand in the way of that and neither should you.
So I told Carl, 'Nobody, no matter how famous their parents are, nobody is allowed to climb on the dinosaur.' But of course this went in one ear and out.....
